title: Sound On: Truss Resigns, Biden Stumps for Fetterman
itunes:title: Sound On: Truss Resigns, Biden Stumps for Fetterman
description:
Joe spoke with Bloomberg Senior Executive Editor David Merritt on the resignation of UK Prime Minister Liz Truss, Inside Elections Analyst Jacob Rubashkin on President Biden's trip to Pennsylvania to campaign with John Fetterman. Plus our panel, Bloomberg Politics Contributor Jeanne Sheehan Zaino & Lester Munson of BGR Group on chaos in UK after Liz Truss steps down, and President Biden campaigns for John Fetterman in the key battleground state of Pennsylvania. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
